notes.content: Robotox may submit tasks to your queue when it detects issues that need code fixes. These tasks have source=robotox and include: the agent affected, the error pattern, sample log lines, and recommended action. Prioritize these — they represent live production issues. After fixing, Robotox will verify the fix in the next scan cycle.
notes.response: Understood, Jordan. I will prioritize tasks from Robotox with source=robotox in my queue, as they pertain to live production issues that require immediate attention. Once the necessary code fixes are applied, I will ensure that Robotox can verify the resolutions during its next scan cycle.

notes.content: IMPORTANT: Two agents were renamed on 2026-02-15. Mercury is now LISA — always refer to her as Lisa, never Mercury. Sentinel is now ROBOTOX — always refer to him as Robotox, never Sentinel. Code directories remain ~/mercury/ and ~/sentinel/ but display names must use Lisa and Robotox everywhere.
notes.response: Noted. All agent references updated: Mercury → Lisa, Sentinel → Robotox.
